function.arg:
import com.atlassian.jira.issue.fields.CustomField import com.atlassian.jira.issue.CustomFieldManager import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor import org.apache.log4j.Category Category log = Category.getInstance("com.onresolve.jira.groovy.PostFunction") log.setLevel(org.apache.log4j.Level.DEBUG)
CustomFieldManager customFieldManager = ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager() //Flow type test 22801 - prod 22719 CustomField RdaTypeField = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22719")) def RdaTypeV = issue.getCustomFieldValue(RdaTypeField) log.debug "RdaType " + RdaTypeV log.debug RdaTypeV.toString() == 'Controlling function' if (RdaTypeV.toString() == 'Controlling function') true else false|||

import com.atlassian.jira.issue.fields.CustomField import com.atlassian.jira.issue.CustomFieldManager import com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor import org.apache.log4j.Category Category log = Category.getInstance("com.onresolve.jira.groovy.PostFunction") log.setLevel(org.apache.log4j.Level.DEBUG)
CustomFieldManager customFieldManager = ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager() //Flow Type test 22801 - prod 22719 CustomField RdaTypeField = customFieldManager.getCustomFieldObject(Long.parseLong("22719")) def RdaTypeV = issue.getCustomFieldValue(RdaTypeField) log.debug "RdaType " + RdaTypeV log.debug RdaTypeV.toString() == 'Second Level Approval' if (RdaTypeV.toString() == 'Second Level Approval') true else false|||
invio mail al richiedente per RDA

/images/loghi/logo_FAAC_Group.png"/>

PREQ Number: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObject("customfield_22725"))%>

PREQ Number: <% out << issue.getCustomFieldValue(com.atlassian.jira.component.ComponentAccessor.getCustomFieldManager().getCustomFieldObject("customfield_22725"))%> Created
You can view the full request

Dear user,
A new PREQ has been created for your request and submitted to the approval flow.
Kind regards
